headline: Race to the Bottom: Heard on the Street Monday Recap
summary: Stocks fell sharply, with a fresh round of trade and AI jitters. Over the weekend, President Trump said he would increase to 15% his new global tariff aimed at replacing many of the duties ruled illegal by the Supreme Court.

raw.headline: Race to the Bottom: Heard on the Street Monday Recap

headline: 2 Profitable Stocks with Impressive Fundamentals and 1 We Find Risky
summary: While profitability is essential, it doesn’t guarantee long-term success. Some companies that rest on their margins will lose ground as competition intensifies - as Jeff Bezos said, "Your margin is my opportunity".

raw.headline: 2 Profitable Stocks with Impressive Fundamentals and 1 We Find Risky
raw.summary: While profitability is essential, it doesn’t guarantee long-term success. Some companies that rest on their margins will lose ground as competition intensifies - as Jeff Bezos said, "Your margin is my opportunity".

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To AppLovin (APP) AI Ad Pivot, Social Network Plans, and SEC Scrutiny
summary: AppLovin reported past fourth-quarter 2025 revenue of US$1,657.94 million and net income of US$1,102.26 million, and issued first-quarter 2026 revenue guidance of US$1,745 million to US$1,775 million while outlining a sharper focus on AI-powered advertising. Alongside these results, the company is pivoting away from its Apps business toward building an AI-driven ad platform, exploring a new social network, and sitting at the center of unconfirmed OpenAI ad-monetization rumors, all under...
